Start Using Armenian Mnemonic

A font must be installed to support this keyboard. Windows includes a number of fonts which support the Armenian script.

Visit  GitHub.com/dotland/mnemonic-kb-hy  for extensive documentation on using the keyboard.

This keyboard uses eighteen dead-keys, such as: Tt Ss Dd Gg Kk Zz Cc '" \ and /, where T is Shift+t or just t with Caps Lock turned on. Press one of these dead keys and then another key to produce the desired output. For instance, press T and then the Space to get Թ; press T and then s to get Ծ etc. Please see the tables below for a complete combination.
